content: पैतृक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पितृत आगतं पितृरिदं वा ठञ्] {@--1@} Relating to a father. {@--2@} Coming or derived from a father, ancestral, paternal; पदमृद्धमजंन पैतृकं विनयेनास्य नवं च यौवनं <ls>R. 8. 6</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 40</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 104</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 47.</ls> {@--3@} Sacred to the Manes. --कं A Śrāddha performed in honour of the Manes or deceased ancestors.
